name: Captain Pressure(Working Version)
description:
Hey guys this Captain pressure the working version(I am Superstar Spudnik from the team). Sorry for the first version, but finally we were able to post a working, still demo, version.

Made by: @MS ANNOTATION X @Superstar Spudnik @GOKIZILLA @100% not Mr.crafty @MLG Guardian 212

We don't suggest anyone play our game because, It is still in development and  It's kind of not good, we want also to add more levels and improve it after the jam! So If you want to play it, wait until we publish the full version of the game! It will be our pleasure if you downloaded our game now, and if you give us some feedback!

How to play:

1. Click on the place that you want to go to.

2. Shoot with space.

3. Kill all your enemies!!!

4. You can pause the game at any time!
